code: import{createStore,combineReducers,compose,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{createLogger}from'redux-logger';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootReducer from'../reducers';import sagas from'../saga';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var logger=createLogger();var middleware=[sagaMiddleware,logger];var enhancers=[applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)];var reducers=combineReducers(rootReducer);var store=createStore(reducers,{},compose.apply(void 0,enhancers));sagaMiddleware.run(sagas);export default store;
